key_risks: Revenue concentration risk due to heavy reliance on a few major OTAs
Competitive pressure from major players like Google
Regulatory risks from operating in over 190 countries
User trust concerns related to pricing transparency and review accuracy
social_issues: Potential user dissatisfaction due to trust issues
governance_issues: Operational complexities due to diverse regulatory environments
